snippet: Sixty firefighters responded to a fatal blaze on Grant Avenue that also critically injured a 3-year-old and sent dozens of residents into the pre-dawn cold.
abstract: Authorities say fire started in Bronx apartment building burned through fourth-floor apartment, killing 7-year-old girl and critically injuring 3-year-old girl.
lead_paragraph: Sixty firefighters responded to a fatal blaze on Grant Avenue that also critically injured a 3-year-old and sent dozens of residents into the pre-dawn cold.

headline.seo: Apartment Fire in the Bronx Kills a 7-Year-Old Girl
headline.main: Fire in Bronx Apartment Building Kills 7-Year-Old Girl
headline.print_headline: Fire in Bronx Apartment Building Kills 7-Year-Old Girl
